author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Election Commission will train government officials for the coming Assembly polls in Tamil Nadu.

The EC, which has already trained State-level master trainers, who in turn have trained district-level master trainers and nodal officers on various aspects of electoral management, will be trained to improve their training skills.

Over 150 participants will be trained in two phases. The first batch would be trained at the Anna Institute of Management, Chennai and the second batch at Bhavanisagar, Erode district, said a press release here.
title: EC to train officials for Assembly poll
